repeated_details.statement: The mitigation hierarchy (avoid, mitigate, restore and compensate) is the fundamental principle of conduct in any of our activities, avoiding the placement of new infrastructure elements in protected areas, integrating the preservation and promotion of biodiversity into the environmental management systems through specific biodiversity plans, collaborating with stakeholders, and encouraging awareness and communications.

repeated_details.statement: Biodiversity aspects related to coal mining are covered in Bettercoal assessments.

matched_statements.text: Biodiversity aspects related to coal mining are covered in Bettercoal assessments.

repeated_details.statement: Certified wood-based biomass fuel originates from sustainably managed forests in which the preservation of biodiversity has been a focus.

matched_statements.text: Certified wood-based biomass fuel originates from sustainably managed forests in which the preservation of biodiversity has been a focus.

repeated_details.statement: In 2019 and 2020 at the Spjutmo power plant on the River Dalälven in Sweden, a Finnish fishway innovation called Fishheart was tested.

matched_statements.text: In 2019 at the Spjutmo power plant on the River Dalälven in Sweden, we started using a Finnish fishway innovation called Fishheart.

repeated_details.statement: Most of our habitat restorations and other projects improving  biodiversity are related to hydropower production.

matched_statements.text: Most of our habitat restorations and other projects improving biodiversity are related to hydropower production.

repeated_details.statement: To strengthen the lifecycle of fish, we use a number of solutions, like fish stocking, habitat improvements, various types of fishways, and trap and transport systems for fish to pass the dams.

matched_statements.text: To strengthen the lifecycle of fish we use a number of solutions, like fish stocking, habitat restoration, various types of fishways, and trap and transport systems to transfer fish over the dams.

repeated_details.statement: We manage the biodiversity impacts of our fuel procurement by using  international certification and assessment systems.

matched_statements.text: We manage the impacts of our fuel procurement on biodiversity by  using international certification and assessment systems.

repeated_details.statement: In 2020, we submitted applications to the Swedish Environmental Court to remove seven dams.

matched_statements.text: Additionally, in 2019 we submitted applications to Swedish Environmental Court to remove four dams.

repeated_details.statement: In conjunction with the dam removal work, the river continuum is restored and stream water habitats can be re-established.

matched_statements.text: In conjunction with the dam removal work, the river continuum is restored and stream water habitats can be re-established.

repeated_details.statement: We have continued our programme of dismantling small dams in Sweden.

matched_statements.text: Fortum has continued its programme of dismantling small dams in Sweden.

smart_statements_details.statement: Fortum set a new4biodiversity target, aiming for at least 12 major voluntary measures that enhance biodiversity to be implemented in 2021.

analysis.specific: at least 12 major voluntary measures
analysis.achievable: voluntary measures that enhance biodiversity

repeated_details.statement: We employ a Group-wide standard entitled Access to Genetic Resources.

matched_statements.text: In 2019, we adopted a Group-wide standard entitled Access to Genetic Resources.

repeated_details.statement: Our land use planning takes biod- iversity impacts into account, with appropriate protective measures being taken on a case-by-case basis.

matched_statements.text: Land use planning takes impacts on bioversity into account, with appro- priate measures being taken on a case-by-case basis.

matched_statements.text: 304-3 Habitats protected or restored

repeated_details.statement: 304-4 IUCN Red List species and national conservation list species with habitats in areas affected by operations

repeated_details.statement: Its objective is to define requirements, roles and responsibilities in order to ensure compli-ance with the Nagoya Protocol under applicable legislation.

matched_statements.text: Its objective is to define requirements, roles and responsibilities in order to ensure compliance with the Nagoya Protocol under applic- able legislation.
